name: Ski-Doo Challenge
description: (Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB) This game supports English and French. Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual". Ski-Doo Snowmobile Challenge is an authentic snow cross experience with officially licensed Ski-Doo snowmobiles. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
